text: Kenmei Boku (朴賢明) is a Korean former baseball player who played in Japan.https://www.baseball-reference.com/register/league.cgi?id=5dc09a77 He played for the Osaka Tigers in the Japanese Baseball League. He reportedly ended up in North Korea and it is unknown if he is alive or dead. ==References== ==External links== Category:Date of death unknown Category:Korean athletes Category:Osaka Tigers players
title: Kenmei Boku
